paymentMethodPage.title: Add a payment method
paymentMethodPage.description: The method will be saved in your IO Wallet and used to make payments or to join compatible initiatives.

iframeCardPage.helpLink: Where do I find the CVV?
iframeCardPage.modalTitle: Where do I find the CVV?
iframeCardPage.modalBodyText:
The CVV code (or CVC) has 3 digits and is located on the back of your card.
On American Express cards, the code (CID) has 4 digits and is located on the front.

inputCardPage.title: Enter your card details

formErrors.name: Enter name as shown on the card

inputCardPage.privacyTerms: the privacy policy and accept the terms and conditions of use
inputCardPage.helpLink: Where can I find the security code?

modal.title: Security code
modal.description: It is a three-digit code, called CVV or CVS, which you can find on the back of your card.
modal.descriptionAE: On American Express cards, the code (CID) has four digits and is located on the front.

bPayPage.title: Do you want to add this account?

paypalPage.title: Choose who will handle your PayPal payments.
paypalPage.description: If you want to change your choice later, just save your PayPal account again in IO.
paypalPage.helpLink: What is a payment service provider (PSP)?

preamble.title: Save your PayPal account and enable quick payments.
preamble.body: Choose your preferred method to pay pagoPA notices, without having to authorize each time in the PayPal app.

managerModal.title: What is a payment service provider (PSP)?
managerModal.body: It is the entity, also known as PSP (Payment Service Provider), that collects the amount on behalf of the Creditor Entity and may apply a fee for the service provided.

pspInfoModal.title: Who is {{pspName}}?
pspInfoModal.body1: It’s a Payment Service Provider (PSP) that can handle your transactions via PayPal.
pspInfoModal.body2: When you pay a notice, they may charge a maximum fee of {{maxFeeFriendlyComp}}. You will see the exact amount before confirming
pspInfoModal.body3: {{pspName}}’s Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy apply

resultPage.completeOperationMsg: If your device asks, grant permission to complete the operation.

GENERIC_ERROR.title: An unexpected error occurred
GENERIC_ERROR.body: Try again or contact us for support.

NOT_LISTED.title: An unexpected error occurred
NOT_LISTED.body: Try again or contact us for support.

errorMessageNPG.HF0003: The session has expired, go back and try again

errorMessageNPG.HF0007: Enter name as shown on the card
